name: Floral Gate
description:
Welcome to the "Floral Gate".

This is a comprehensive Funny Game.

In the current version, we provide one main functions:

Happy Chess House

————————————

HAPPY CHESS HOUSE
The real funny game for everyone.

Have you ever encountered a situation where you wanted to play some TRUTH or DARE games, but always found yourself lacking the specific challenges you desired? Or perhaps you discovered that expansion packs for challenges were excessively expensive?

Now, your search ends here with this game "Floral Gate" - HAPPY CHESS HOUSE !!!
You have the freedom to create your own personalized challenge set, incorporating any gameplay elements you wish to try.
From family fun to college roommates party, from couples to even wilder adventures, this game has it all—everything you desire in one package.

Simple and easy rules, similar to five-in-a-row.
Fast round, no boring waiting time.
Just-click to play, so that players can focus on each other.

————————————

Add "Floral Gate" to your game library, and ENJOY.
